channel.title: Generative-Ai on Granular Material
channel.description: Recent content in Generative-Ai on Granular Material

item.title: Infinitely Wide Culture
item.description: A lot of this is still unresolved in my mind, but I think there is something interesting happening at the intersection of generative AI, art, style, and entertainment. Rather than letting it gestate until more fully formed, I figured I’d just post some preliminary thoughts and come back to this at some later date. The main reason I’m thinking about this now is the ongoing debate about how generative AI will impact creative fields, such as writing and design (as well as white collar jobs more broadly).
